mapper.select: WITH TotalPurchaseQuantities AS ( SELECT SUM(sp.Purchase_Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM supply_purchaseorder_table sp INNER JOIN supply_material_category_dictionary_table smcd ON sp.Material_Number = smcd.Material_Number WHERE smcd.Material_Class = #{materialClass} ), SupplierPurchaseQuantities AS ( SELECT SUM(sp.Purchase_Quantity) AS SupplierTotalQuantity FROM supply_purchaseorder_table sp INNER JOIN supply_material_category_dictionary_table smcd ON sp.Material_Number = smcd.Material_Number WHERE smcd.Material_Class = #{materialClass} AND sp.Supplier = #{supplierCode} ) SELECT (COALESCE(SupplierTotalQuantity, 0) / TotalQuantity) * 100 AS RatioPercentage FROM TotalPurchaseQuantities, SupplierPurchaseQuantities;

WITH TotalNetValue AS ( SELECT SUM(sp.Net_Value_Order) AS TotalNetValue FROM supply_purchaseorder_table sp INNER JOIN supply_material_category_dictionary_table smcd ON sp.Material_Number = smcd.Material_Number WHERE smcd.Material_Class = #{materialClass} ), SupplierNetValue AS ( SELECT SUM(sp.Net_Value_Order) AS SupplierNetValue FROM supply_purchaseorder_table sp INNER JOIN supply_material_category_dictionary_table smcd ON sp.Material_Number = smcd.Material_Number WHERE smcd.Material_Class = #{materialClass} AND sp.Supplier = #{supplierCode} ) SELECT (COALESCE(SupplierNetValue, 0) / TotalNetValue) * 100 AS RatioPercentage FROM TotalNetValue, SupplierNetValue;
